snippet: Adam Clayton Powell Jr. Boulevard has become one of Manhattan’s most dangerous roads, leaving hundreds injured or dead in recent years.
abstract: Adam Clayton Powell Jr Boulevard in Harlem has become one of Manhattan’s most dangerous roads, leaving hundreds injured or dead in recent years; meetings are being held between the Department of Transportation, Harlem residents, community groups, and Community Board 10 to settle on measures to make the boulevard safer.
lead_paragraph: Adam Clayton Powell Jr. Boulevard has become one of Manhattan’s most dangerous roads, leaving hundreds injured or dead in recent years.

headline.seo: On Harlem’s ‘Boulevard of Death,’ Changes Planned to Calm Traffic
headline.main: Changes Planned to Calm Flow of Traffic on Harlem’s ‘Boulevard of Death’
headline.print_headline: Changes Planned to Calm Flow of Traffic on Harlem’s ‘Boulevard of Death’
